### About me

I am student of [Economics undergraduate at Universidad de Los Andes](https://economia.uniandes.edu.co/programas/pregrado-en-economia). In my work, I constantly use programming languages such as Statistical programming in [RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/) and [Stata](https://www.stata.com/).

### Research interests
My primary interests are Macroeconomics, International Economics, and Monetary Policy. I am also interested in Statistical Programming, Big Data, and Applied Mathematics.
